content: Here, you’ll find a large group of unique enemies not found elsewhere - Civet Sergeants. These small cat-like Yaoguai are armed with two swords apiece, and are led by an emboldened Civet Sergeant who boasts more health and attack, as he drops the Civet Sergeant Spirit when killed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
Here, you’ll find a large group of unique enemies not found elsewhere - Civet Sergeants. These small cat-like Yaoguai are armed with two swords apiece, and are led by an emboldened Civet Sergeant who boasts more health and attack, as he drops the Civet Sergeant Spirit when killed.
